website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy rain boots from a trusted footwear brand that come at a surprisingly affordable price.
pros: Made from lightweight and comfortable molded crosslite
Easy for even little kids to pull on and off themselves
Durable to stand up to regular use
Kids love the charm holes for easy personalization
cons: Some buyers report the top of the boot is quite narrow

customer_reviews.title: None have held up like these. The others would generally start cracking on ...
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 boys and have been through many of the "cute" rain boots with patterns of rocket ships and dinosaurs. None have held up like these. The others would generally start cracking on the vinyl or split at the seam up the back of the leg, if not just wear a hole in the sole in a few short months. The no seam design on these has withstood the abuse of small children.
customer_reviews.author: DJG

customer_reviews.title: Light weight rain boots
customer_reviews.text: These are great for kids. It’s not heavy so he can grow into when the winter/ rain season arrives. My 3.5 years old wears size c9 crocs and the little kids 10-11 fits him now and have some space to grow into. The design is simple which I like and the color blue is his favorite. These are a great option if you don’t want to purchase very expensive rain boots for kids or those very childish ones
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Murray

customer_reviews.title: Croctastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who goes through shoes like he goes through underpants. They are strong sturdy and comfortable. They are light weight so you don't here the normal clunking from when you little ones are wearing rain boots and they have great protection from water. I was concerned about the holes at the top of the boot but thus far have not been an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Great boots.
customer_reviews.text: Loved our last croc boots so much that we simply aimed to replace them when they became too small for my son. Lightweight and awesome for my toddler. Bought a size too big because they stay on so well that we can get by skipping a size.
customer_reviews.author: DomesticEngineerMom

customer_reviews.title: Grandsons favorite. He loves that he can jump in puddles!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson had a pair and he wore them till they were too small. Just order the bigger pair. These are his favorite boots.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots more sizing options would be nice.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the boots but they were too big and couldn't find the correct smaller size... No half sizes...
customer_reviews.author: Alonso Adalfuns

customer_reviews.title: Good rain boots
customer_reviews.text: My kids love their crocs rain boots. I like that they are lighter than other rain boots, molded so they don't "blow out" at the bottom seam like other rain boots, and are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these crocs For my 4 year old! We sized up so that he could comfortably wear socks with them and they fit great and are sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Pretty design and very light weight boots
customer_reviews.text: Pretty design and very light weight boots. The best choice for rainy weather. Have bo.ught it the second time and will buy again. My 5 years old daughter's size is 10-11 US.
customer_reviews.author: Jullee

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these boots. He has wide feet and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit! Easy to get on and off. Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bruskevith

product_meta.title: Crocs Kids' Boys and Girls Crocband Jaunt Boot
product_meta.description:
Boot

Don't let the rain halt your Jaunt: let your little one step out anyway in Crocs Crocband Jaunt boot. This simple pull-on in Croslite promises perfect puddle-jumping with a non-slip sole. The odor-resistant material fights the dank, so your Jaunts are never jeopardized in Crocs.

Crocs, Inc. is a rapidly growing designer, manufacturer and retailer of footwear for men, women and children under the Crocs brand. All Crocs brand shoes feature Crocs' proprietary closed-cell resin, Croslite, which represents a substantial innovation in footwear. The Croslite material enables Crocs to produce soft, comfortable, lightweight, superior-gripping, non-marking and odor-resistant shoes. These unique elements make Crocs ideal for casual wear, as well as for professional and recreational uses such as boating, hiking, hospitality and gardening. The versatile use of the material has enabled Crocs to successfully market its products to a broad range of consumers.

See more
feature_bullets: Crocs Children and Junior Size Guide
Add some style to a rainy day with these fun Crocs™ Kids boots.
Constructed from Croslite™ material for lightweight comfort.
Retro detailing adds a timeless look that translates well into the present.

Midsole band pay homage to the classic vulcanized styles of yesteryear. Plenty of holes for the Jibbitz™ shoe charms so that you can add your own custom touch. Lightweight construction. Comfortable shock-absorbing outsole relieves pressure from your feet, lower legs, hips, and lower back. Footbed conforms to foot creating a custom fit. Measurements: Weight: 5 oz Circumference: 8 1⁄2 in Shaft: 6 in Product measurements were taken using size 8-9 Toddler, width M.
